department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology
department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班

goal.en: Enhance the ability for the students to write the essay and perform the project through group discussion.
goal.ch: “本課程的主要目標是讓學生了解數位學習研究領域的發展, 並指導研究生撰寫論文.“

content.en: Assist the students to write the essay

grading.ch: “報告60％ 出席20％ 小組討論20％“
